context: Do you like the director Terry George?
Terry George has directed Hotel Rwanda, starring Sophie Okonedo and Joaquin Phoenix. He is quite a director!
Hotel Rwanda sounds familiar, what movie is that?
resp: Hotel Rwanda is an historical drama based on the true story of a hotel manager who housed over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda. ‎
